gcci.text: H100 supply chain easing as fab capacity ramps, stabilizing pricing around $3.29/hr and reducing capex for large AI deployments.

gtpi.text: Token input costs have collapsed to $1.37 per million due to fierce API price wars and model efficiency gains, pressuring competitors to lower rates.

gagl.text: The 150 TWh annual AI workload is straining power grids, accelerating nuclear baseload adoption to meet carbon reduction targets.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment remains bullish but warns of bubble risks as growth sustainability is tested by high capital expenditures and rapid infrastructure scaling.
